Prelogue.name: Father
Prelogue.line: Alright Son, listen. Your Mother is sick, if I dont do something, she might die. You understand me?

Prelogue.name: Father
Prelogue.line: Good. Now, I need to search for her cure, and so, I need to leave you with your Mother and Sister.

Prelogue.name: Father
Prelogue.line: You're no longer a boy now, Son. You're a man now, a family man, and a family man need to protect his family.

Prelogue.name: Father
Prelogue.line: Now, before I go, I will teach you the means to defend yourself, as well as your family

Prelogue.name: Son
Prelogue.line: What? Just to look after the family while you're gone? I've done that many times while you're gone, isn't that a bit too much Father?

Prelogue.name: Father
Prelogue.line: Don't be too relaxed Son, this village maybe safe from outside because of the village wall but this is not the peace time we know.

Prelogue.name: Father
Prelogue.line: The Kingdom is in chaos because of The Plague. Bandits roam the country and while things are fine now, our village will soon be affected. Hunger can make men goes mad, Son. I know this.

Prelogue.name: Son
Prelogue.line: Alright, Father. So, what do we do now?

Prelogue.name: Father
Prelogue.line: Now, Im going to teach you swordmanship and archery, as well as making some medicinal potions. Pay attention and listen well.

Chapter1.name: Villager1
Chapter1.line: ... it's about the plague you see...

Chapter1.name: Villager1
Chapter1.line: Apparently, there is a rumour that bandit has one...

Chapter1.name: Villager2
Chapter1.line: Huh, a bandit? Then it's a lie! How could a mere bandit have something like that?

Chapter1.name: Villager1
Chapter1.line: Shut your mouth a moment and let me finish, besides this guy is no ordinary bandit!

Chapter1.name: Villager1
Chapter1.line: They call him, The Bandit King. They say he's so fearsome, he could create a thunder from a stick!

Chapter1.name: Villager2
Chapter1.line: Thunder? From a Stick? Hah! more lies! besides if the whole medicine thing is true, it's no use if there is only one!

Chapter1.name: Villager2
Chapter1.line: The damn medicine would attract the worst, everyone would kill for something like that nowadays...

Chapter1.name: Villager1
Chapter1.line: True that, but something has to be done with the Bandit King nonetheless. He's been harasing traveler near the mountain path

Chapter1.name: Son
Chapter1.line: .......Bandit King,on the mountain path... As I recall when I was traveling with father, there is an abandonet fortress near there...

Chapter2.name: Son
Chapter2.line: You have been defeated, tell me what you know about The Medicine

Chapter2.name: Son
Chapter2.line: Wait! dont speak! What are you doing here? This... how can this happen?!

Chapter2.name: Father
Chapter2.line: Rggh!! Leave it be... its futile to fix that now. Listen, I have to tell you something....

Chapter2.name: Father
Chapter2.line: I-It's about the medicine, a-as, as well as the Sorcerer...

Chapter2.name: Father
Chapter2.line: The state I'm in, a Bandit King, he decieved me and hypnotize me. To do as his bidding, to gather various item for his vile experiment...

Chapter2.name: Father
Chapter2.line: He has residence in a cemetery, not far from here, bu- Rgghhh!!

Chapter2.name: Father
Chapter2.line: S-son! Listen! This is the last wish of your father... accept what I've become, and fulfill my last wish...

Chapter2.name: Son
Chapter2.line: What is it that you ask, Father...

Chapter2.name: Father
Chapter2.line: Defeat the Sorcerer, Avenge me... Do that for me... your sister... your mother... as well as the Kingdom...

Chapter2.name: Son
Chapter2.line: I swear it will be done, in your name

Chapter2.name: Father
Chapter2.line: Ah... Im proud of you S-son.. ... ...

Chapter3.name: Sorcerer
Chapter3.line: Grrhkkk!...Damn mongrel whelp! What do you want?!

Chapter3.name: Sorcerer
Chapter3.line: Hah! The cure for the Plague?! Like I'd tell you! Go die!

Chapter3.name: Son
Chapter3.line: I know your kind..., Cowards. You hide behind others, as you manipulate the to do your bidding, like you did to my Father

Chapter3.name: Son
Chapter3.line: I guess I'll have to this the hard way then... Alright, i will start with your-

Chapter3.name: Sorcerer
Chapter3.line: W-wait! Spare me! I'll talk! There is a hidden compartment in that shelf! There is the cure! Please spare me!

Chapter3.name: Son
Chapter3.line: Men like your ilk deserve no quarter nor mercy...

Chapter3.name: Son
Chapter3.line: Your vile experiment caused the Kingdom great suffering! Your abominations defile the lands, wreaking havoc on every corner of the country

Chapter3.name: Son
Chapter3.line: My Father.... my mother.... my sister... my village...., all this for what...?

Chapter3.name: Son
Chapter3.line: An oath fulfilled, I did it... Father, Mother, Sister, .......everyone
